page.title: 17BRAFIELD ... recent events.
page.content:
Brafield-on-the-Green is a village {split}by the speedy Northampton to Bedford road 4 miles East by South of Northampton.
The population of 600 includes an {undertaker}who of late has been turning his hand to royal chauffering.
Each year for the last four, the village hosts a horticutural show; the money raised in the past has gone to the{St. Laurence Church Restoration {Fund.
The focal point of the old part of the village is{a pond}occasionally invaded by milk weed, surrounded by grass where ducks waddle and sheep nibble.
